duties_responsibilities.duty: Visit select Nordstrom/Bloomingdales locations 2x weekly to ensure merchandising and inventory standards are met.
Educate sales teams on John Hardy brand knowledge and selling techniques.
Engage with store leadership and establish John Hardy as a top jewelry brand in each location.
Negotiate and assist with floor moves to best floor locations, and execute team ad-hoc requests.
Host brand events in select Nordstrom locations quarterly and support in planning, clienteling, and traffic driving.
Manage in-store visit schedule, book travel, schedule appointments, and prepare pre-visit worksheets, as well as conduct post-visit summaries.
Attend weekly virtual check-ins with John Hardy team.
